ResourceHeader.ResourceName: TIMED SEE Level2 XPS Solar Irradiance Data
ResourceHeader.Description: The 12 X-Ray Photometers (XP) aboard SEE perform full-disk irradiance measurements of the Sun for about 3 minutes every orbit (97 minutes) which usually gives 14-15 measurements per day. 8 of the XPs produce XUV signals (more info on XP coatings) and one other XP provides a hydrogen Lyman-alpha measurement (121.5 nm). The XPS Level 2 data is time averaged over the entire day, after being 1-AU corrected and removing flares. The 1-AU correction is provided.

AccessURL.Name: SEE Data Products web page
AccessURL.Description: This web page allows the request of data files for this product. To request data: for the XPS data type of interest, click the year of interest to go the the ftp directory of files and download the desired day-long file by clicking on it.

NumericalData.ProviderResourceName: SEE Level 2 XPS Solar Irradiance data

Structure.Description: Dimensions: [Number_of_bandpass_wavelength_ranges] - where Number_of_bandpass_wavelength_ranges is the number of bandpass wavelength ranges.

Parameter.Name: Channel index
Parameter.Description: Channel index of the 12 XUV Photometers (1-12)

Structure.Description: Dimensions: [Number_of_bandpass_wavelength_ranges] - where Number_of_bandpass_wavelength_ranges is the number of bandpass wavelength ranges.

Dimensions: [Number_of_bandpass_wavelength_ranges, Bandpass_wavelength_range_limits] - where Number_of_bandpass_wavelength_ranges is the number of bandpass wavelength ranges, and Bandpass_wavelength_range_limits is the pair of values specifying the lower and upper wavelength limits.

Parameter.Name: XPS median solar irradiance
Parameter.Description: Solar irradiance - median for the day

Structure.Description: Dimensions: [Number_of_bandpass_wavelength_ranges] - where Number_of_bandpass_wavelength_ranges is the number of bandpass wavelength ranges.

Parameter.Name: Difference of median and weighted average solar irradiance
Parameter.Description: Difference of median and weighted average solar irradiance over the day

Structure.Description: Dimensions: [Number_of_bandpass_wavelength_ranges] - where Number_of_bandpass_wavelength_ranges is the number of bandpass wavelength ranges.

Parameter.Name: Accuracy of solar irradiance
Parameter.Description: Accuracy of solar irradiance averaged over the day

Structure.Description: Dimensions: [Number_of_bandpass_wavelength_ranges] - where Number_of_bandpass_wavelength_ranges is the number of bandpass wavelength ranges.

Parameter.Name: Measurement precision
Parameter.Description: Measurement precision averaged over the day

Structure.Description: Dimensions: [Number_of_bandpass_wavelength_ranges] - where Number_of_bandpass_wavelength_ranges is the number of bandpass wavelength ranges.

Parameter.Name: Standard deviation of median for good measurements
Parameter.Description: Standard deviation of median for good measurements

Structure.Description: Dimensions: [Number_of_bandpass_wavelength_ranges] - where Number_of_bandpass_wavelength_ranges is the number of bandpass wavelength ranges.
Dimensions: [Number_of_bandpass_wavelength_ranges] - where Number_of_bandpass_wavelength_ranges is the number of bandpass wavelength ranges.

Parameter.Name: Median of Total-Dark-Visible currents
Parameter.Description: Median of Total-Dark-Visible currents from level 1 with FOV and 1-AU corrections applied

Structure.Description: Dimensions: [Number_of_bandpass_wavelength_ranges] - where Number_of_bandpass_wavelength_ranges is the number of bandpass wavelength ranges.

Parameter.Name: Number of measurements used
Parameter.Description: Number of measurements used in daily average

Structure.Description: Dimensions: [Number_of_bandpass_wavelength_ranges] - where Number_of_bandpass_wavelength_ranges is the number of bandpass wavelength ranges.
Dimensions: [Number_of_bandpass_wavelength_ranges] - where Number_of_bandpass_wavelength_ranges is the number of bandpass wavelength ranges.

Parameter.Name: Degradation function linear extrapolation/interpolation flag
Parameter.Description: Long value = 1 if degradation function is linearly extrapolated, 0 if linearly interpolated
